app.title: Pixel Studio
home.title: Create amazing pixel art and animations
home.description: A powerful pixel art and animation editor with a simple and intuitive interface. Create digital art, game sprites, animations, and more. With support for multiple layers, advanced drawing tools, and flexible export options, you can bring your creative ideas to life.
sectionMiddle.description1: See your creations come to life in real-time as you draw and animate. The intuitive interface allows you to make instant adjustments and see the results immediately.
sectionMiddle.description2: Export your animations as GIFs, PNGs, or ZIP files. Easily share your creations with friends or use them in your game projects.
sectionMiddle.description3: Pixel Studio is an open-source project, which means you can contribute to its development and customize it to suit your needs. And best of all, it's completely free for personal and commercial use.
sectionBottom.title: Available on all platforms
sectionBottom.description: Pixel Studio is a cross-platform application available for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS. Create digital art and animations anywhere, anytime. *(Android and iOS are in development and will be released soon.)
